title: Joe Lennon
text: Joseph Finbarr Lennon (1934 – 23 November 2016) was a Northern Irish <a href="Gaelic%20football">Gaelic football</a> <a href="Manager%20%28Gaelic%20games%29">manager</a>, <a href="Gaelic%20football">player</a> and <a href="Sports%20broadcasting">sports broadcaster</a> who featured on "<a href="The%20Sunday%20Game">The Sunday Game</a>". His <a href="National%20Football%20League%20%28Ireland%29">league</a> and <a href="All-Ireland%20Senior%20Football%20Championship">championship</a> career with the <a href="Down%20GAA">Down</a> senior team spanned seventeen seasons from 1954 to 1970. Lennon <a href="Captain%20%28Gaelic%20games%29">captain</a>ed Down to the <a href="All-Ireland%20Senior%20Football%20Championship">All-Ireland title</a> in 1968.
